name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Image Glowbox

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the glowbox
default: 30.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the glowbox
default: 30.0

content.name: glow
content.description:
the image to use when it is glowing
default: the "vivid test logo" image

content.name: dim
content.description:
the image to use when it is not glowing
default: the "colour squares" image
